name: mem_closure_iff_ultrafilter
initialProofState:
X : Type u
x : X
s : Set X
instâœ : TopologicalSpace X
âŠ¢ Iff (Membership.mem (closure s) x) (Exists fun u => And (Membership.mem u s) (LE.le (â†‘u) (nhds x)))
decl:
/-- `x` belongs to the closure of `s` if and only if some ultrafilter
  supported on `s` converges to `x`. -/
theorem mem_closure_iff_ultrafilter :
    x âˆˆ closure s â†” âˆƒ u : Ultrafilter X, s âˆˆ u âˆ§ â†‘u â‰¤ ğ“ x := by
  simp [closure_eq_cluster_pts, ClusterPt, â† exists_ultrafilter_iff, and_comm]

name: continuousAt_iff_ultrafilter
